lines.text: Oh, it's been a long time since--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If they fucking use Fluffernutter against me, I will be so pissed off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, that's the one thing we're really--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If only one of them used a crossbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You thought you hated Otis before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I probably only have, like, 10 bolts on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You might want to buy some while you're in town.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to need a couple tuning forks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that we can attune to this plane of existence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've never tried it, but I bet we could figure it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll ask Artie about it, he'll know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I have a minor errand to run, just some components to purchase.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, oh, oh! Can you get some ivory?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I can afford it, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And what is your thing with ivory, lately?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I can have some ivory, then I can do this spell where we can find out some secrets.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may have some components, too, I'll hit you up later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I might be able to lean there and get some more of those medallions, and hopefully put us all off the map.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you need company on this meeting or?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think we should walk up to the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we probably want to have you give a little hello, hello.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then my only other question is, that will either succeed or fail, but once we're done, are we going straight back into the cold or do we want to, I can bring you back to see your families for--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we have-- I mean, as much as I would love to and want to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like we should talk to the Bright Queen as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't we have a ticking clock?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think that is part of the cold, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we can get back there and it'll cut down our travel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could take us also to Nicodranas, if you want, and back into the cold, in one day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nicodranas, then Dynasty, and then back into the cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we don't come back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To be fair, Caduceus, your family as well?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we're not able to take Lucien down here, he's taking these threshold crests to the Astral Sea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why aren't you guys telling anyone about the eyes on you? I understand you wanting to keep it a secret, but if there's a way to get them removed why aren't you trying to do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it's not a secret from you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or learning anything about it, having anybody-- or showing them what happened to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, I guess I-- the fear, as soon as Allura could have potentially seen the eyes and kicked us out quicker than any assistance would have been given.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or deemed us too dangerous to leave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It crossed my mind to tell her, but...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just want to make sure we've got our ducks in a row first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The only reason I say that is, if we leave it unchecked and it's something that can be used against you or you, we'll feel very foolish for as long as we can feel it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could check in with Yussa.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't work for them and they really aren't attached to either of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd be willing to talk to Yussa.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's just adding another hour or two to our stay in Nicodranas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can show them to Trent and then just cut his head off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'd be happy to do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You would do it much faster, though. Mine would be slow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caduceus, may I see that staff? Okay, I will lay it out and begin Identifying it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It can cast the cantrip Prestidigitation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can look up "staff of power."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it is definitively her custom one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So there's not an "Allura's staff of power" here, it's "staff of power"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Much like your sword belongs to Kima.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyone have dibs on the scepter of blasting, the rod of blasting?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of has your name written all over it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I have your rod, Caleb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I have to attune to this, Matt?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'm going try to put my dagger down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you not picked up on that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! I didn't know he couldn't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, what does the dagger do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, does it have any magical abilities?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it seems to have a little bit of extra damage when I hit someone with it, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, why don't you Identify the dagger and see if it's worth getting rid of the dagger or using the scepter?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you look at the scept-- the dagger that Veth has been using and see if it's better than the scepter?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I mean, if it's not better then why would you want to hold onto it, you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're looking at the staff of power?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will admit, I opened it, too. It's a lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is a wizard's best friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a Caleb sort of staff?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It depends on whether or not you want to go messing with what you got.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord, do you want an Ioun stone? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's like that, is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is the Ioun stone do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forget. I gave it as a gift.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It stores an extra spell of some sort of level, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I actually thought it made him less squishy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going down beneath a hundred hit points, but it's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to find out and I'm turning it off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I literally have a necklace of plant command, which I don't think is going to come in very useful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got to punch him in the gut real hard, so it comes back up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which finger do you want to put it on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The right hand, here you go, zoom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have this rod if anyone wants it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to see that dagger you have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, will you look at that dagger and find out if it's better or not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which Ioun stone was it? Ioun stone of?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of the three things that you have attuned, that's the thing to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I got a ring of evasion, which means I succeed every dex save I ever make in this game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to look at my dagger?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, I will spend the next 10 minutes trying not to look over at the staff as I identify the dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as he goes to reach for it, you instinctually pull the dagger back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, why don't you just rest it down with your hand on the floor and I will work around it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll keep a pinky on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 10? It's fine, you don't need-- you know what it does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This rod, I don't even really know what Thunderwave is, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Deception or persuasion, depending on how you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) It's a Ring of Fire Resistance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, what does it do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a knife! You can stab or throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's it? It's a throwing knife?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can throw it or stab it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's got some sort of magical qualities to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't you have Caleb look at it, then?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 'Cause it's awesome! I know what it does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't you want to know it backwards and forwards?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put it on the floor so I can help you out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ADHD starts kicking in and you pull away like, "Nah, it's fine."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we need to have Yasha restrain you? What's going on here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Command on Veth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to say, "Drop it."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, is that a charisma or wisdom saving throw? What is that one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But wait! I can re-roll ones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't just throw it in now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're such a dick! (laughs) I love it! I love it! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It clatters to the ground and you're just standing there in amazement that you dropped it, and that's where you are so far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to step over and kick it farther away from her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long do I have to obey this command?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to pick it up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to pick up the dagger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like people stealing from me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will give it back to you when we know why you're being so weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The intensity immediately fades for a second and you're taken aback by the fact that you're holding your weapon towards Yasha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I-I-I'm so sorry I pulled a weapon on you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've done that to you all, so it's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I have to have it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you kick it out of Yasha's hands?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought she dropped it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to step on it and walk while--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And when you hit with an attack, you can expend a hit die to deal an additional 3d6 necrotic damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like we learned that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And every time I've been healing I've been marking off a check mark, because once I go down below a certain number of heals, I die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If at any point you don't have any hit dice to spend and you're healed, you immediately die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, cool! (laughs) Good, good! You attuned to this thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where did you get it from?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before we get to the wonder staff, does anybody have shitty constitution? Low con modifier? Because the Ioun Stone is dope!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm okay. I have a plus eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a plus four and it gave me a plus five, I think it gives you plus two to your con.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It increases your constitution by two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am not sure what to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your hit points would go up by 13.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just dropped down to 87 hit points, and that's rough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But the ring will get me out of massive damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The third object is the staff!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I wish you could attune to four things!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does anybody have a third item that they're kind of eh about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I've got this Ring of Fire Resistance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the side of my face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I've got a Staff of Withering that I've used once, just 'cause--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you like this Ioun Stone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You going to take it back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many hit points do you have?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can have it if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you switch the stone for the ring?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Any time a Fireball or anything--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what I was looking at.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, no, no, I think it's going to be--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sure Nonagon's got something that could kill me but--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think one of you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just Google Ioun Stone of Fortitude and see what it does to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I like what I'm--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can swap with you if you need something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think I'm going to give that Ioun Stone to him 'cause I'll have an open attunement slot, whatever we come across.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, hold on. I can give you the ring back, Fjord.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not-- I just mean-- You gave it to me because you had the stone, and I don't want to take away--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want the stone or not, Caduceus?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit, you're giving back the class ring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no! That's not what this is! I was just letting you know I will gladly keep it on, I just thought you'd want it back--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know where my letterman jacket is? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look for the one that gives the constitution bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let me see what I've got.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester, thank you for curing me of my dagger disease.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you were weirder than normal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not going to use your stupid cursed dagger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I mean, it's pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because you're going to be in the middle of things.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it's more important that you guys--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did this baller staff look like again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it has these strips of material that dangle from the intricate top of it, like three tethered strips that just flow as it moves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not really your aesthetic, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not your aesthetic at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wrap it in a dirty rag.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to be more in the thick of things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can keep wearing the ring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We don't have to banter about this for 40 minutes necessarily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, that's probably not very interesting to watch. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leaving you with a faint sense of rejection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything else anyone would like to do before the night has come to an end?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to pull out the collar from inside the Folding Halls and the power source and try to tinker with it a little bit before falling asleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To try to get it charged up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great, go make an arcana check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel it's that little bit of a faint electrical sense You feel it's that little bit of a faint electrical sense of being on the cusp of discovery, but you're not there yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to try and get a quiet moment with Caleb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So tomorrow night, if we're going to be in Nicodranas, I'd kind of like to do the date thing, you know, with Yasha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got to do the math on that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we could still borrow it for the night?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, other people can stay in it, but, like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, no, I'm into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I don't have to, you know, I don't want to be...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if you took the whole tower?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would love to take the whole tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll talk the others into using the material plane with the dome or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the Lavish Chateau, we'll be there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll pay for everyone's room if people will fuck off so that we could use the tower.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So that you can fuck off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do not go poking about the eighth floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I promise you I will not go poking about the eighth floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'll just slide it over to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give it to me in the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I will, you know, think on it, process it, get it ready.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can the cats be ninjas? (laughter) Just five of them, not all of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But maybe you mean ninja cats?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to be able to just have fun fighting some ninjas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not a bunch, just a handful of other things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, it can be done, but sleep on it, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell me if you need the cats removed for the evening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got an idea for that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You don't have to-- I just need it by the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you cool? You good, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll let you get back to work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I spend the next hour working on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I slink back to my chambers.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dreams of ninjas for some reason.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was so creepy sounding, Matt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to all the continents.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (like Stefon) It had humor, it had magical items, it had terrible dreams!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It had ninja cats on a date night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up from there next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two eyes? Or is it going to be all nine eyes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course it is! We ain't shown nobody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're turning into one of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can do an eight-hour game, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We had a five-hour game a couple of weeks back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That staff better have eye removal in that bitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dude, that staff is so clutch.
